body.p: Onychocryptosis is more commonly known as an ingrown toenail. The "onycho" prefix means "nail" and "cryptosis" means"hidden." This uncomfortable condition can occur if people incorrectly cut their nails. Nails consist of several layers of dead keratinized cells that continually need to be trimmed because:

multiple_choice.choice: The matrix continues to produce new cells for the nail folds.
The matrix continues to produce new cells for the nail root.
The nail root produces new cells for the cuticle.
The lunula contains live reproducing cells.

feedback.p: Incorrect. The matrix produces new cells for the nail bed; the nail folds are part of the surrounding epidermis.
Correct. The matrix continues to produce new cells as part of the nail root and this results in nail length continuing to grow.
Incorrect. The nail root's matrix produces new cells for the nail bed; the cuticle is part of the surrounding epidermis.
Incorrect. The lunula is near the matrix and is composed of recently divided cells that have not flattened and are producing keratin, making it less transparent.

hint.p: The nail body itself is composed of dead cells, but what is in the nail root and matrix?
